text: Subject for a Short Story () is a 1969 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.«Он был замечательный мужик, добрый, щедрый, с душой нараспашку»Сюжет для небольшого рассказа It stars Nikolai Grinko, Marina Vlady, and Iya Savvina. == Actors == * Nikolai Grinko as Anton Pavlovich Chekhov * Marina Vlady as Lika Mizinova * Iya Savvina as Mariya Pavlovna Chekhova * Rolan Bykov as Mikhail Pavlovich Chekhov * Aleksandra Panova as Yevgeniya Yakovlevna Chekhova * Yevgeny Lebedev * Yury Yakovlev as Potapenko == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1969 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Subject for a Short Story
